links_reviews_text: Would have been a a perfect Easter dress if we weren't all stuck at home :(
It was a very cute sundress but it was a little too tight in the top. Would recommend sizing up for larger busts.
I ordered a size larger than usual and it fit well! Even a little snug. I'm usually a 5/6 and I got it in a US 8. This dress is cute but it's nothing to write home about.
I normally wear a 0 but bought a 2 and it was far too small around the ribs. The straps are also very tight and only connected by plastic string
This dress was one of my favorite items! You can dress it up or down. I wore it with white converse for an outdoor gender reveal and it was a hit! I will purchase it come my next rental.
I read the reviews and sized up and it was still very small. It’s really cute but I recommend sizing up a few sizes.
Cute concept, but the sizing is WAY off. I would recommend sizing up 1-2 sizes for this.
Super delicate zipper felt like it was gonna to break getting caught in thicker material.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for all different occasions
links_reviews_text: I originally picked out this dress to wear to an engagement party but I loved it so much that I also had to wear it to work! It is super flattering and the colors are beautiful. I would recommend this dress to everyone. Also you do not have to wear a bra with it :D
I sized down one size and it fit like a glove! This dress is the perfect length and print for summer or even fall. Would definitely wear this again and recommend. So comfortable!
Fit great aside from the chest! Could not zipper all the way. Unfortunately a size up would probably be too long. Beautiful dress otherwise!
This dress has more volume on bottom than pictured. It's not very flattering and appears very boho, which is not the look I was going for. It is also really hard to zip. I was not a fan.
It had a fairly tiered tent like look, but the fitted top helped. It was cute enough, but didn’t wow me.
Very fitted waist, there is no give! Tight sleeves despite elastic, size up with this cute summer/spring piece. Still worth it to me! Length hit below my knee, not sheer.

I recently wore to a work event, and the length/fit was perfect. It was very flattering, but not too exposing. I kept it because I could also wear with sneakers or sandals in the summer for a daytime look. It fit my chest perfectly, but i could see some sizing issues if you need a little more room around the chest. Also, the elastic in the cap sleeves was a little snug, but nothing that bothered me too much. Excited to wear again!
A little too long for me and a little Little House on the Prairie. Just couldn’t work it
I really wanted to love this dress, but with the length and the pattern, I really felt like a peasant. I totally get now why they had the model pose like the face out!
awkward for petite
Cute simple sun dress, liked the pattern and sleeves
It was just alright. Wasn't a huge fan, never wore it. Just wasn't my style. But the fit is true to size.
Loved this dress! Super cute and it perfectly! Would recommend to any petite ladies out there who struggle to find dresses that fit in all the right places.
This was a cute basic dress but it was tight in the caped sleeves and in the waistline.

links_reviews_title: Good dress, just not for me
links_reviews_text: I kind of thought it would be more flowy and comfortable. It was nice but it just made me feel a bit more prairie than I wanted
Was super excited for it but turned out looking very little house on the prairie. Could not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Cute, a little small on top
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small in the shoulders and bust. Waist/length was fine
Flattering fit for pear shape. Great length below the knee, and nice lining to keep it off the body.

links_reviews_title: Not true to size, couldn't even get it on.
links_reviews_text: It didn't fit at all unfortunately.

I added this to my nuuly because I was drawn to the vintage vibe, the length, and romantic simplicity. I like that it acts as a transitional summer-to-fall sundress. The lining underneath is made of a pretty heavy material. It looked really cute with a chunky sweater layered over it, woven flats and a wide brimmed hat, I wore it to a casual afternoon shopping and lunch date with a girlfriend. Downside: there is no stretch to this dress and the material is not very breathable. Bustier girls should probably avoid this style.

This dress is so cute and very flattering but the top part is very tight. Like raising my arms to the side is very difficult. I have a very flat chest and narrow shoulders so I would size up in the dress in the future, when I typically would not.

Thought this was a lovely dress to wear during the day, and for a nice casual night out! I felt like the elastic in the arm bands were a little tight, but would be interested in renting again in the next size up. Posting the only pic I have of it, from a distance and from the back- but hey I love seeing pics so I’ll post what I have!
Sweet smock. The sleeves are elastic and are just too tight. It’s tight around the waist where the zipper runs as well. Disappointed.
Dress was nice but a little tight in the arms and top where it felt a little restricting.

This dress was very cute but fit snuggly in the torso and sleeves. I wore it with a jean jacket overtop and it still looked really great. Fabric was a bit cheap feeling. Otherwise, great day/work outfit!
Not flattering but maybe if you wear a waist belt it would be cute

When I first put on this dress, I fell in-love! It is so adorable in person and I received many compliments! I will say it does wrong a tad small in the shoulder/bust area; I also have broader shoulders. I wear an xs/s and have a 34B bust area and the it was a bit tight around the bust. I would recommend sizing up IF you want a loose fit. Overall, I loved wearing this dress and it is so cute!
I would have given it 5 stars but this dress is TIGHT! If you are in between sizes I would size up. Gorgeous dress though!

Ordered this dress to wear to a track party outside. Dress was lightweight and kept me cool and was able to move in it. Tighter around bust and torso area and then flares out. I really like the print and cut of this dress as well. Can be dressed up with wedges or worn casually with sneakers and a cropped jean jacket.
Cute dress but a little more matronly than it looks like online with thicker material. I am also petite so the dress fit a little long/big on me!
Really flattering, and the slip underneath makes it easy to wear!
Good dress for work or play! A little snug around my rib area other wise fit perfectly.
Enjoyed wearing this once. I feel like it is perfect for a teacher - modest and sweet. In my office, and at my age (48), the print and bow were maybe a little too precious.

links_reviews_title: Super sweet dress, but runs small (order a size up)
links_reviews_text: I love this dress, but it runs too small for me. I need to go up a size for my chest size.

Beautiful dress but I could barely get it on and felt claustrophobic once I did get it on. The material has absolutely no give. I also found the length to be a bit awkward on me (it hit a few inches below the knee). Not quite maxi but not really midi either. Print and balloon sleeves are fun though. I wish it would have worked out.
Fits as expected. Body hugging fit
This dress is magical! Super flattering for someone with curves. Very much fitted at top and then flows out. Light weight and love

Loved the pattern and material on this dress but didn't wear because it was too small. Particularly around the bust an in the arms (and I have a small chest). I would size up at least one size if not two. May not be for women with larger busts

I really wanted to love this dress! The print and silhouette look so cute on the model. The fabric also looks very light and airy. In person, the fabric is thicker than I had expected. And unfortunately the fit is too tight in the wrong places - something that the image does not portray. I rented in my normal size and was disappointed to find it almost impossible to get over my head.
Got this dress to wear for an anniversary dinner but unfortunately the fit was very off. The neckline/chest situation was quite odd fitting and the hemline was extremely short.
This dress is so pretty, I love the color. However, the fit was so strange. I never wore the dress because the fit was so uncomfortable and also short. I would definitely size up.

WOW. I can not explain how many ways this dress did not work for me. I am taller than average (but not that tall), and my butt (any other things) were completely showing in this dress. It looks great in the photos, but didn't translate in person at least for me.

I liked the idea of this dress but it just didn’t work out for me. I wore it as a top with jeans rather than a dress (hello cold weather). one of the sleeves begins at the end of the shoulder and it kept falling down so I had to wear it differently just so I wouldn’t have to readjust every minute. It’s open in the front so you can’t wear a bra with it and throughout the night I had to make sure there weren’t any nipslips. I’m a size small and it did fit a little tight.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but sleeves are weird
links_reviews_text: This is such a great dress for any day party, but I wish it fit better. Both sleeves were a little short on me (I’m on the taller side) and one sleeve kept falling off my shoulder. Body of the dress for me perfectly though.

links_reviews_title: Super cute! but also super specific fit.
links_reviews_text: Wore this with sneakers to tone it down a little. few things to note -Very short on me (tall girl here) the arm width circumference runs a little smaller than most i'd say and the slice cut out panel on the bust was a little fussy- it is lined BUT photographs great, looks amazing on, tons of compliments
I sized up and this was still too small. I was able to get it on and zipped but would not be comfortable wearing it out because it was so tight and short. Super cute dress though I wish it worked.

links_reviews_title: Very Cute Style, but for a limited audience
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, and was excited to try it. I was disappointed to put it on and have it not fit. I'm very curvy on the bottom, so I always size up when looking at fitted items but this runs small. It was VERY short (it did not pass the sit test), and very fitted on the bottom. I would say if you have a curvy bottom, skip it. Wish I could have worn it though, cause the top is adorable!

links_reviews_title: Nice style but I got a size too big
links_reviews_text: Loved the style but way too big for me. In reality I could have got two sizes smaller for my waiste. They were the right length though.
nothing fancy- was too long and big around the leg- out shopping
A little small size up if you like me don’t like tight. The fabric is great but thick making them tighter than I like. I will wear during the next 30 days but to buy I need next size up.
Never wore this since the fabric is not stretchy at all, which makes these jeans uncomfortable. It fits me on the waist but not on the hip. Size up if you want to try this!
For those that like a little stretch in their jeans, these are not the pair for you. From 6 am to 7 pm, I was super uncomfortable especially when sitting down because these did not stretch.

links_reviews_title: Love style— runs a little large
links_reviews_text: Love the style of these jeans, and they’re on the thicker side too. One downside is that they are a little bit on me. Still wearing :)

I’m usually a 31/32 in BDG. I’m curvy so since this had a cinch waist I got the 31. But it sadly ran small (I think due to the cut). Glad I got to try it because it made me realize the straight leg cut is def not for me. Would definitely recommend for non-curvy folks.
Loved the look and feel of these high-waisted black jeans!

I loved wearing these jeans. I am normally a 29 but the 30 was in stock so I figured I would try it. I think they're a true 30, since they were a bit large on me, but were fine with a belt. I received a few compliments on these jeans - they pair well with everything. I wore these at least twice a week; they were so comfortable and I could see myself keeping these in a constant rotation!
Super flattering. I am very curvy with a small waist and they fit my waist perfectly. Highly recommend.
I sized up due to the reviews it was too big. The length is too long without the sizing up. These are okay jeans
Honestly the perfect jean. Very comfortable (+ has good stretch) and I used it so much! Goes well with anything.
fit perfectly but I'm normally a 29 in other brands so I'm glad i ordered 1 size up! probably not good for shorter girls.
The color and fabric are great, but they run really small. Order a size up, even if you don't think you need to.

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans but sized up per notes and they were too big.
links_reviews_text: I sized up after reading previous comments and I wish I had not. I should have ordered a 28 instead of a 30.
i ordered one size up based on the other reviews. they fit well, super flattering.
These were my go-to jeans this month! They fit really nicely, but weren’t cropped on me

links_reviews_title: Cute, but not for petite girls
links_reviews_text: I loved the style, but they are not meant for petite girls. I was hoping it would be ankle length, but it wasn't for my 5'2' frame.
I didn't get to wear these because I didn't look at the size chart before I ordered them...I'd need at least 2 sizes up to get them on!

links_reviews_title: Great one of a kind tee
links_reviews_text: Great t-shirt, it fits like a cropped tee, I would say the sizing is more like XXS. Styled it with a blazer and 501’s
Typical 501 fit where I should have gone a lot more sizes up. I recommend this pair for a size 27/28 maybe
I love stiff vintage denim but unfortunately these were just a hair too tight for me to wear. The waist fit well, but I couldn’t pull them all the way up, to fit snugly.
The sleeves are long but tight in the armpit. Also the shirt is super short. Gave it 2 stars because the fabric is nice and vintage-y.
Perfectly worn in. Styled this with a range of bottoms, from basic jeans to a flouncy skirt. If you can snag it- do it! You won’t regret it.
It’s ok. A great color but not really special tbh

I am starting a petition to raise money to buy this jacket. My husband's name is John and this seems to have been made for a particularly small person (I'm a petite 5'1"). This is such an easy to wear denim jacket - I love it! Definitely want to call out again how small it is! If you're not an XS, I wouldn't advise it!
I wore this a bunch of times. I love red and the neck detail is cute. It is def a vintage tee the fabric has that feel.
The shirt is oversized, which I liked. Very soft and worn. Loved the colors, bummed I didn't get to wear it more.
I liked the idea of this shirt but it does feel very used.

I felt like i was fresh off the set of Stranger Things in this bad boy. Steve Harrington would have been so into it. Super soft and perfectly worn in, this tee paired perfectly to blue jeans for a denim-on-denim look and with a leather midi skirt and sneakers for a night out.
I’m curvy and they were too snug in the butt

links_reviews_title: Killer jeans, sizing is way off
links_reviews_text: These are classic orange tabs and frankly, amazing. But they were touted as a 28 and being a 27, I could not get them over my thighs! Bummer.

I measured the waistband of these and they’re 13” across or a modern size 26 with no stretch. They’re really cute! Cropped and flared, and made my butt look good. Just be aware of the sizing. I wore these with fringed booties and a tee, and also with a leather jacket.

links_reviews_title: These were perfect for me, but I'm short!
links_reviews_text: I loved these - they fit like a glove. In fact, they were a little snug, especially since I normally am a size 26 or 27 in jeans, but I sized up since these were rigid. These were ankle length on me (I'm 5'1"), so they would be cropped on most people. They were high rise, slim through the leg with a flare at the bottom. I got a lot of compliments...considering purchasing these!
I loved these Jeans. I am always a size 29 but there is no stretch to these so I would recommend sizing up! I wish they fit bec they are so cute!
I wear a 23 or 24 in almost all pants, especially jeans. I have a 23" waist and 34" hips. I could not even get these remotely on my body. They are very small!!
Denim runs really small. I usually wear a size 25. This fit is way too small for me. It’s actually a size 24 opposed to a 25.
I’m more of a petite size so these were too long and too baggy in the front.

I’m giving these 5 stars because they are amazing vintage Levi’s. Unfortunately these fit closer to a small 14. I wear a 33 in most jeans and I couldn’t get these on. Super sad but I am excited to see someone else rock them.

These were fun. I had the same pants in my teens, so really fun to wear in my 40's. The waist was too tight, so I had to pull the hair tie over the button trick, but there was no deterring me from pulling these off!
My regular size is a 25, but I always size down to a 24 in Levi’s so I thought these would fit.... I couldn’t even come close to buttoning them. Super disappointed because they look so cute!
These are so cute but SO small. I consider myself a tiny person and usually wear a size 24 in Levi’s. These wouldn’t go above my hips! I was so sad I couldn’t wear them!
I'm normally a 27, so these fit like a highwaisted boyfriend jean, which I loved. Wash was great. These were full length on me, so would likely be cropped on most (I'm 5'1").
Runs a little small, but super cute.
This fit perfect, it wasn’t too long for a short-waisted girl of 5’4”. Was perfectly proportioned for high waisted jeans! In great, comfy condition for vintage.

these had sort of a weird fit. im usually a 24 or 25 in levis vintage, however these were SO tight around the waist and thighs, i could barely sit in them. despite them being tight, they were weirdly kind of baggy in the crotch? and a little long for me. the upside of these jeans is that they did great things for my butt.

links_reviews_title: Didn't seem like the right size
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 28 or 29 in jeans and these 29's would not even button!

Four stars for being in great shape. However. I would only recommend these for curvy ladies with small waists. I'm have narrow hips and small butt but an average waist, and I just didn't have the shape for them. But I think they would be really cute on someone with a booty. Try them!!

I wore these jeans so much, I almost considered buying them if they didn’t retail for so much. I will definitely rent them again. They were comfortable and fit perfect. I wore them with tucked in T-shirt’s, mostly.

links_reviews_title: Love the look, but not the feel
links_reviews_text: I thought I would love this, but it's not as soft as many other vintage t-shirts that I own. I love the tie-dye pattern on it, but wish it were a softer shirt!

links_reviews_title: Wow, if you wanna look cool, wear this
links_reviews_text: LOVE THIS VEST.

This piece was fun and vintage, but I never found an outfit that it worked well with. It was too casual for the office, but not warm enough to wear as a coat. I think this would work well in the fall as a light jacket, as it's difficult to wear as a layering piece inside.
This was a great summer layer
I've been looking for some cute overalls and these were it! It's a little long for my legs so I had to cuff the hem. The waist fit me fine, but the legs are super wide and baggy.
Fits as expected. Size up for a more boyfriend fit
Great shape and quality, disappointed they didn't fit.
Really wanted to buy these - they're a little large around the waist but just look relaxed and are SO comfortable.
runs large in waist - 27s didn't fit even though thats what I am

links_reviews_title: Was great - except for the too-tight waist. Bummer.
links_reviews_text: Love these, and wore them with a fun sweater. But the mid-section? Ouch. My poor tummy. Or maybe it was the holidays?

Super cute vintage top! I noticed when I added this to my nuuly it said to size down so I assumed this would fit more like a jacket (I'm a medium in jackets) and this did fit, but it fit more like a shirt than a jacket. The patches really added a nice touch and this would definitely be cute on someone more petite than I am.
